text:
KiOui Apps. Minneapolis MN. We make apps for sellers.

Our Amazon repricer manages over $95 mill. in Amazon inventory.

Receive direct mentorship from sellers making millions of dollars a year.

We want detail-oriented builders who take responsibility for their code. No direct experience needed.

Email Ali@KiOui-apps.com.

REMOTE. INTERNS. Minnesota. eCommerce. Startup. Privately Funded. Equity. Node.js. PHP. TDD. Internship. Javascript. CSS. Designer. Data Scientist.
